reviewText: This is the second copy of the DVD that this Nana has purchased.  The first finally wore out.  Curious George DVD's are always a smart purchase.
My four year old daughter is a huge Curious George fan.  This is a must have for all George fans.

My 2 year old loves watching Curious George on pbs while at home.  We must have several dozen episodes recorded.  Now when we go on road trips, we are able to watch Curious George thanks to the dvds.  They are the same episodes you watch on tv. Each DVD contains 8 shows totaling over 90 minutes of pure entertainment for our child to watch.

We love Curious George! It is the only cartoon my husband and myself enjoy watching with our girls. There is something very endearing about George, this cute innocent little monkey who finds everything fascinating. We've bought most of the DVDs and our four and six year old watch them over and over again, topping their Barbie and Strawberry shortcake movies. With Curious George, a parent doesn't have to worry about anything questionable sneaking in (like some Barbie movies) and my kids have learned a lot to boot! Thankful for the series and always on the look out for the next installment!

This new George DVD doesn't disappoint. There are some episodes on here from as early as Season 2 that I was glad to see are getting included finally! This DVD contains : The Fun-Ball Tally, This Little Piggy, Trader George, Downhill Racer, George Cleans Up, Scaredy-Dog, Up a Tree, and Bag Monkey. None of these are repeats on previous DVD's as far as I can remember. Enjoy!
We love George!

What's not to like about George!  The little guy is always into something, but somehow always comes out on top.  There are many lessons to be learned from each segment on this - and all other George DVD'S.  A good investment for a child's DVD library - or for adults.
DVDs I have ordered have always been in great condition with no issues. My son loves George.
My son loves George!
Perfect!!
My children enjoy the Curious George episodes.
Great, my grandson loves all the Curious George CD's as he sits glued to the t.v. and can watch them over and over again.

A perfect video collection for young children.  Even though you can see these Curious George episodes through Netfix and PBS programming, the handy DVD is perfect for travel (if you have a video player in your car/van).  The episodes are geared for children as young as 2 years old, and they are a perfect tool for learning things in a quiet way.  They are calming and have simple story lines that are also teachable.  Curious George is such a likable character that children will naturally identify with him.  Because he does not talk, the visual expressions and sounds he makes are easy to understand his curiosity and problem solving.  I put these good programs of learning into my little grandsons life.
I buy a lot of Curious George my 2 grand sons love George. we have almost every DVD, and tons of George things.
We have quite a few of these DVD's and this is one of my son's favorites...  The Tree house and Piggy Bank episodes are is absolute favorites.
There's just no such thing as bad George!
Cute episodes,  my son enjoys these.  I recommend it for Curious George fans.
love it
My son just loves Curious George we even have the sippy cups. He will sit for hours if I let him. Very happy he can watch something good instead of something on Tv.
great

My daughter loves and I mean loves anything curious George. I have been purchasing these here and there and I am so glad that Amazon has these. These little movies can keep my daughter busy and also learn for hours.
I highly recommend these.
Great videos for our grandson for Christmas gift.
My daughters love these movies.
Thanks for the fast service. Everything was fine.

My 3 year old LOVES George! Parents please be aware - George movies will play on their own after a few rounds of music on the menu screen. This can be a parents dream come true or nightmare. I swear, my child- unlike me, NEVER tires of this dvd!
